archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.2.3d: d) minimise the need for special access privileges (e.g. User IDs that have additional capabilities, such as Administrator in Windows systems, or special capabilities, such as User IDs that can be used to authorise payments)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
